results.title: Marxism: the theory that split a world
results.creator_credit: International Cinemedia Centre, Learning Group of America, John Kemeny and George Kaczender
results.brief_description: A combination of animation, archival material, documentary and fictional recreation is used to portray the history of Karl Marx, and to give the audience an understanding of the influences to his theory of communism.

results.title: Marx for beginners (TEFC)
results.creator_credit: Contemporary Films, Cucumber Studios and Bob Godfrey
results.brief_description: Bob Godfrey and his collaborators, Clive Morton and Kevin Attew, have created a distillation of the works of Marx. Its intention is to make Marx more accessible and attractive to a wide range of people through its humorous graphic style.

results.title: Marvin's room
results.creator_credit: Miramax Films, Scott Rudin, Tribeca Productions, Jane Rosenthal, Robert De Niro and Jerry Zaks
results.brief_description: Bessie is a strong, sensitive and selfless middle-aged woman who has sacrificed her life to look after her ailing and bed-ridden father and slightly daft aunt. Her younger sister, Lee, shirked off such responsibilities, left home, married and had two children before divorcing. The marked differences between the two have meant that neither sister has been in contact for 20 years. But now Bessie has been diagnosed with leukemia, and her survival may depend on the sister she has long since erased from her life, or her two nephews whom she has never met. Cast includes: Diane Keaton, Meryl Streep, Robert De Niro, and Leonardo Di Caprio.

results.title: Marvel, a Jakarta Boy
results.creator_credit: Film Australia, John Morris and Keith Gow
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “Our Asian neighbours. Indonesia”.
A day in the life of a 14 year old boy. Marvel comes from a migrant Minangkabau family, seeking a new way of life in the busy city of Jakarta. He sells rice cakes to the taxi drivers outside the tourist hotels. His father is a middle man in a small “Pasar”.

results.title: Marva
results.creator_credit: CBS News and Suzanne St Pierre
results.brief_description: Marva Collins is a teacher who set up a school in a low income area of Chicago. There are no frills, and students are drilled in vocabulary and multiplication tables, and are required to read one book every two weeks. Many of her students love reading, and Marva is an inspiration to them.

results.title: Marusska and Wolf Castle
results.creator_credit: Kratky Film, Phoenix Films, BFA Films and Video, Miroslav Kubricht, Vlasta Pospislova and Edgar Dutka
results.brief_description: Animated adaptation of the traditional Moravian tale of Marusska, a poor mountain girl, who dares to enter a haunted wolf castle and subsequently suffers the curse of the she-wolf.

results.title: Marty
results.creator_credit: United Artists Corporation, Hecht-Hill-Lancaster, Harold Hecht and Delbert Mann
results.brief_description: In his Academy award winning performance for best actor (the film also won awards for Best Picture, Best Director and Best Writing, 1955), Ernset Borgnine went against character to portray sympathetic 34 year old single butcher, Marty. Marty is harangued by his mother (Esther Minciotti) to find a nice Italian girl and settle down like his younger siblings, yet paradoxically is surrounded by family who are in unhappy marriages. When Marty meets shy schoolteacher Clara (Betsy Blair) at a dance, Marty instantly finds a soulmate amongst his emotionally stifled and unhappy family and friends. To his surprise his blossoming relationship with Clara is challenged by his mother who feels threatened by the shy, yet educated and socially aware woman, and his friends who unkindly view her as a “dog”. Marty struggles to make up his mind whether to pursue happiness and flee his emotional isolation.

results.title: Martina: fitness and conditioning workout program
results.brief_description: During 1981 Martina Navratilova commenced a training regimen spurred on by a fourth place computer ranking and many defeats. The workout is designed to improve speed strength, balance agility, and cardiovascular fitness. The video shows step-by-step just how Martina achieved top physical condition, and how others can achieve it too.

results.title: Martin the cobbler (K)
results.creator_credit: Billy Budd Films and Will Vinton
results.brief_description: A clay animated film for children about a Russian shoemaker who discovers new meanings in life by meditating on on truths. Based on a Leo Tolstoy folktale “Where Love Is, God Is”. The introduction and narration is by Alexandra Tolstoy, daughter of Leo Tolstoy.
